Class Artwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • Artwork
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Painting, Sculpture

    public class Artwork
extends java.lang.Object
    Artwork.java This class creates and stores Artwork. This is a Super Class with two subclasses :- Painting and Sculpture
    Author:
    Emily Fothergill

    • Constructor Detail

      • Artwork

        public Artwork(java.lang.String auctioneer,
               java.lang.String title,
               java.lang.String creator,
               int artCreationYear,
               double reservePrice,
               int numBidsAllowed,
               boolean newArt,
               boolean onAuction)
        Constructor of Artwork objects.
        Parameters:
        auctioneer - The user that placed the Artwork on auction.
        title - Title of the Artwork.
        creator - Creator of the Artwork.
        artCreationYear - Creation year of the Artwork.
        reservePrice - Given reservation price of the Artwork.
        numBidsAllowed - The set Number of Bids allowed on the Artwork.
        newArt - The boolean value that sets Artwork as new to System.
        onAuction - The boolean value that sets Artwork to on auction.
